Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to enhance document processing efficiency with an agent in AI Builder. This feature will reach general availability on September 15, 2025.

How does this affect me?
This feature enables you to utilize a document processing agent to enhance business workflows by automating the collection, extraction, categorization, and validation of data from diverse document types. The document processing agent includes preconfigured flows and a validation station.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit Enhance document processing efficiency with an agent.

Title: AI Builder - Enhance document processing efficiency with an agent
